ygData.subject: Re: Brass or  Wind???
ygData.msgSnippet: I tested this on newbie rats, and all of you can too! I played Denon s Discord for one pulse on a rat.  Used a normal horn. I watched the rat s health bar drop
ygData.messageBody:
I tested this on newbie rats, and all of you can too!
I played Denon's Discord for one pulse on a rat. Used a normal horn.
I watched the rat's health bar drop to the middle point, then drop again and
it died.
I played with the Minotaur Horn in the same manner. One "pulse" then
watched the rat. With the Minotaur horn I did far less damage, and didn't
even kill the rat.

If you're really in the mood, just test in on a friend you duel and write
down the numbers, but I was satisfied just watching how quickly I could kill
rats with a normal horn over the minotaur variety.

Roop

>None of the brass instrument songs I've gotten so far require
>that a horn be equipped. Have you actually seen your brass
>skill increase while using a Minotaur Horn?
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
